${V_TODAY}
About this document
This document is a processing summary report. It contains basic information and results obtained via the analysis of a set of given GNSS stations. It is automatically generated by the program ${V_SCRIPT} after a seccesseful run of the processing scheme designed at Dionysos Satellite Observatory, NTUA.
Revision History
1.0.0 2015-01-22 XP Initial release.
Feedback
Missing information, missing links, missing characters? Mail it to the maintainers of this document: xanthos@mail.ntua.gr, danast@mail.ntua.gr.
